actions.text: Amendment (A005) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee (TX).
On agreeing to the Jackson Lee (TX) amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment increases research and development funds for PTSD and TBI by $500,000 offset by a reduction in funds for general operations and maintenance activities in the Department of Defense by a similar amount.
purpose: An amendment numbered 69 printed in the Congressional Record to transfer funds from Operation and Maintenance to the Defense Health Program.
